item.title: NCLH
item.description: score:276 Chances: Norwegian Cruise Line shows rising price performance, earning an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating Oceania Cruises, the world’s leading culinary- and destination-focused cruise line, has announced the appointment of its two Master Chefs of France, Chef Alexis Quaretti and Chef Eric Barale Goldman Sachs sees smooth sailing ahead for cruise stocks, it said as it initiated coverage of three on Wednesday.
